comm with a very interesting combination

now you know my philosophy you decide

there's our arugula if you see any

all right so the liquids gonna evaporate
and in the mushrooms in the corn are

I'm gonna turn the heat off once the

there's plenty heat in that corn and

now the light was going down this was

when that sunlight hit my saute pan I

going to continue to wilt that arugula
so even though a few pieces don't look

as we put this in the bowl like I say
it's gonna continue to cook and again
this combination the earthiness of the
